item.title: My Vim Story
item.description: If you have worked in a command line at some point, I am sure you can praise the wisdom of learning how to use a text editor. On Unix/Linux command lines, text is king and learning how to manipulate text effectively goes a long way for productivity. If you know how to open a file and edit its content, that enables you to configure your system. I have been using Linux for a long timeâ€”even on my desktop/laptop system.
